title: Spicy chilli cottage pie
ingredients: ['3 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', 'juice of 1 lime', '50g butter', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '750g beef mince', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 birds-eye chilli, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided', '3 tablespoons grated Cheddar cheese']
